name: RobotIndustry
description:
Have you ever had that bitter taste while farming for hours to get what you want in a game?

Our goal, to play smarter, to create a deeper gameplay that makes you think about the structure of your factories instead of farming resources.

In RobotIndustry, you play as a small robot, you have arrived on a new planet similar to Earth. Your goal is to colonize the planet, reproduce and evolve.
To reproduce for a robot is simply to create similar ones, and to evolve by creating new and more sophisticated parts.
